1095090.name: The Remission of Sins
1095090.description:
STORY
Thank you for coming.
The showpieces presented at the exhibition are liable to trigger anxiety and stress.
Are you of a healthy mind and body?
Choose to forgive or kill the five men and women on display.
How will this affect the hero’s fate?

SUMMARY
The Remission of Sins is a fully-voiced, multi-ending short horror visual novel. Depending on the player’s choice, it branches to 12 different endings.

VOICE ACTORS
Male Guide : Ryoukuu Asanuma
Female Guide : Hiyori Koharu
Person A : Nyoibou
Person B : Mizuki Madoka
Person C : Saionji Kouto
Person D : Kuchitani Aya
Person E : Hiramatsu Ukyou
Person F: Kagurazaka Motoko
1095090.supported_languages:
英语, 日语*, 波兰语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
